name: Rip Smithy
descriptions: Rip Smithy is one of the inhabitants of Point Lookout. He is a member of Plik's hunting club, and accompanies the Lone Wanderer during Plik's Safari in 2277.
A merchant, hired-gun, and part-time smuggler, Rip Smithy recently made a boatload of caps selling a pair of child slaves named Sammy and Squirrel to Eulogy Jones over at Paradise Falls.
If the player character leaves the area before Rip or Jacob, they will appear and participate in the next safari.
Rip Smithy appears only in the Fallout 3 add-on Point Lookout.
Xbox 360 Due to a bug, it is likely that his face will appear much paler than the rest of his body.
